channel.title: Using a proxy
channel.description:
Anyone knows how to play runescape through a proxy?
I have tried setting both the browser and java (using the options in the control panel) to use a proxy, but it doesn't work. (The game connects directly, not through the proxy).
Thank you in advance.

item.title: Using a proxy
item.dc:creator: @zstars zstars
item.description:
@zstars wrote:

Yes, I think so, it still seems to ignore the proxy settings and connect directly. The “you last logged at ip” thing shows my real ip. Has anyone managed to connect to Runescape using a proxy with the official client and confirmed that the logged ip is the proxy one?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 02:47:33 PM[/size][hr]Ok somehow, telling java to use the browser proxy settings, I’ve managed to get it to work. The logged ip changes accordingly

Read full topic

item.title: Using a proxy
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Did you use a SOCKS5 proxy?

Read full topic
